Key Match Events: Anthony Davis recorded a triple-double with 36 points, 16 rebounds, and 7 assists
Bronny James became the first father-son duo to play in an NBA game together
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James and his son Bronny James were expected to play in the game
Donte DiVincenzo and Julius Randle joined the team for their first official game
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Davis dominated the game, scoring 36 points and grabbing 16 rebounds
The Timberwolves struggled with their clunky offense and turnovers in the first half
Nickeil Alexander-Walker was a positive contributor, hitting his threes and improving the team's plus-minus rating
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rudy Gobert struggled to fit in with his new teammates in the first half
The Timberwolves lost the offensive rebound battle 10 to 5 and the turnover battle 10 to 3
